name: One Night At Pygame's
description:
One Night at Pygame's is a horror game inspired by Five Nights at Freddy's and One Night at Flumpty's. The game was made for Pygame Community Halloween Jam

The theme of the jam was "near sighted/blind", in the game you sit in your room, you don't see what is behind those 3 doors (left, right, and one in the center), and you can only rely on the sounds, from which door the sound is coming from, you should close that door or else... You will find out what will happen when you play the game. it's really short and it turned out to be really easy.

Source Code

As this is a parody of the game, I allow you to do whatever you want with my code

You can download the source code on both GitHub and here,  just scroll down

Thanks

Big thanks to @event-forgers from Pygame Community Discord, It was fun to create a horror genre game. 

Thanks to pmp-p#5972 now you can build web builds of pygame games.

Join the pygame community here: https://discord.gg/7fzHZF5tA

Credits

FakeMusicGenerator- An awesome tool that generates music

Pygame Snake SVG - Traced by Mega_JC#8804

Fonts Used: FFF Forward Font, Digital-7

I hope I didn't miss anything. Thank you for playing!
